value:
Life is so much easier when I wear a
veil. No one can tell who I am... So no
one pries into my affairs.

The shows in Cyrkensia are grand.
Aristocrats—even royalty—come from
all over just to see them...$k$pI've even heard tales of a songstress
who became a queen. Once the king
saw her sing, it was love at first sight.

Do you have trouble sleeping?
Everyone in the Order of Heroes
works so hard...$k$pIf you want to hear a lullaby, don't
hesitate to call on me.

Princess Sharena asked me to teach
her how to sing. Why don't you join
us? You might learn a little something.

I have an idea for a new song. I think
it would be lovely to sing about this
world after I return to my own.

I bring greetings from
$Nf. $k$pIs there a reason you're looking at me
so intently?

If I'm meeting your expectations,
then I'm happy.

I'm pleased that my skills are
developing.
What a shame.

You've decided to entrust me with
this power? Thank you.

I'm a songstress from another world...
Who I am doesn't matter. Just know
that I'll fulfill my role.

While I was performing, I heard your
voice, clear and strong. It said that I
was needed.$k$pMy first thought was that I must go.
I didn't understand what a summoner
was, then. But now, I'm happy to help.$k$pEven so, I cannot stay here very long.
I'm on a journey into the darkness...
and my true allies are waiting for me.$k$pThe path before me is dim. I don't
know whether I'll make it to the end...
If a cruel fate awaits me...$k$pIf I disappear... Call to me. Your voice
can give me form. I believe this, and I
believe in you.
せやっ
Here I go.
くっ…！
I was careless...
My heart is singing!
Time for a requiem!
Let's strike up a tune!
It's curtains for you!
It's over...
Yes
Glad to sing for you.
Please stay safe.
I'm afraid that I must wear this to keep my identity in the shadows.
I wonder if anyone in the Order of Heroes loves to sing too?
Just before I arrived here, I was part of a show in a place known as Cyrkensia.
What a gift, coming here. The Heroes of so many worlds are able to share their songs with me.
The power of song conveys honesty so purely. I hope you feel the truth of how I feel about you.
Of course.
On the way.
Let us sing.
I'll try to save this world with my song.
